product_name: BIC Sport Adjustable Stand Up Paddle - Medium Blade - Carbon Fiber Shaft
long_description: Perfect for shifting applications from touring to surf, the BIC Sport Adjustable stand up paddle adjusts to cater to the water you're paddling. Medium blade is ideal for all-around padding, racing, low-cadence paddling styles and those looking for a lot of power in the water. Carbon fiber shaft provides an extremely lightweight connection to the water; the Bic Sport Adjustable stand up paddle adjusts from 67 - 83 in. Adjustable length is also ideal for multiple paddlers. Fiberglass blade provides responsive power, and blade shape pulls smoothly through the water. Palm grip fits naturally in your hand, offering you refined control for a variety of paddle strokes.
short_description: Perfect for shifting applications from touring to surf, the BIC Sport Adjustable stand up paddle adjusts to cater to the water you're paddling.
